remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建 委托时，需要标识将处理该事件的方法。When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，请将该委托的一个实例添加到事件中。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非移除了该委托，否则每当发生该事件时就会调用事件处理程序。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 使用委托中处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events with delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了如何使用不同的鼠标事件上绘制的路径鼠标。The following code example demonstrates using different mouse events to draw the path of the mouse on a . 直线段添加到为每个和发生的事件。A line segment is added to the for each and events that occur. 要更新该图形的调用方法每个`MouseDown`和`MouseUp`事件。To update the graphics, the method is called for the on each `MouseDown` and `MouseUp` event. 此外，向上或向下时滚动的图形路径事件发生。In addition, the graphic path is scrolled up or down when the event occurs. 其他鼠标事件，例如，屏幕上进行标识。Additional mouse events, like , are identified on screen as well. 此外在屏幕上显示为鼠标从有关的其他信息类。Also displayed on the screen is additional information about the mouse from the class.
